00006 // Is `new_unit' a compatible unit for the dimension ?
00007 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00008 bool vcsl_length::compatible_unit(vcsl_unit_sptr const& new_unit) const
00009 {
00010   return new_unit->cast_to_length_unit()!=0;
